RumorFact.Text: I detected a chiming signal coming from Ember Twin.

ExploreFact.Text: A memorial to the Nomai reunion near the gravity cannon on Ember Twin.
A Nomai named Poke believed the Ash Twin Project could be used to duplicate matter, or even people.
The Nomai feared that a shuttle colliding with Ash Twin would be fatal for any passengers.
I found a set of crystalline cairns on Ember Twin that contain a message from a member of an unknown species to the Nomai. It offers great knowledge to the Nomai when three criteria have been met.
Symbols are scattered throughout the message written on the crystalline cairn.
